<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/60417</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>60417</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_374</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_374</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Derivadas. Aplicaciones. Optimización</string>
            <string language="en">Derivatives. Applications. Optimization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitungen. Anwendungen. 
Optimierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dérivés. Applications. 
Optimisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derivatives. Aplicações. 
Optimization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Derivati. Applicazioni. 
Ottimizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγωγα. Εφαρμογές. Βελτιστοποίηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de derivada y sus aplicaciones. Se estudia el cálculo de derivadas y algunas aplicaciones a la física, a la biología y otras ciencias. También se estudia su aplicación a los problemas de optimización.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of derivative and its applications. It includes the calculation of derivatives and some of the applications to physics, biology and other sciences. It also studies the applications of derivatives to problems of optimization.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aplicaciones</string>
            <string language="en">applications</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">optimización</string>
            <string language="en">optimization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tasa de variación media</string>
            <string language="en">mean rate of variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Ableitung und seiner Anwendungen zu 
studieren. Es enthält die Berechnung der Ableitungen und einige
der Anwendungen zur Physik, zur Biologie und zu anderen 
Wissenschaften. Es studiert auch die Anwendungen der Ableitungen
zu den Problemen Optimierung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept du dérivé et de ses applications. 
Il inclut le calcul des dérivés et certaines des applications 
à la physique, à la biologie et à d'autres sciences. Il 
étudie également les applications des dérivés aux problèmes de 
l'optimisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito do derivative e das suas aplicações. Inclui o 
cálculo dos derivatives e alguns das aplicações à física, à 
biologia e às outras ciências. Estuda também as aplicações 
dos derivatives aos problemas do optimization.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto del derivato e delle relative applicazioni. 
Include il calcolo dei derivati ed alcuni delle applicazioni 
alla fisica, alla biologia e ad altre scienze. Egualmente studia
le applicazioni dei derivati ai problemi di ottimizzazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια του παραγώγου και των αιτήσεών της. 
Περιλαμβάνει τον υπολογισμό των παραγώγων και μερικές από 
τις εφαρμογές στη φυσική, τη βιολογία και άλλες επιστήμες. 
Μελετά επίσης τις εφαρμογές των παραγώγων στα προβλήματα 
της βελτιστοποίησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optimierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittelkurs der Variante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">applications</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">optimisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cadence moyenne de variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dérivé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aplicações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">optimization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">taxa média da variação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">applicazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottimizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">derivato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφαρμογές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράγωγο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
